title: Witnessing the Growing Importance of UI/UX Design in the Tech World - Analytics Insight
content: Witnessing the Growing Importance of UI/UX Design in the Tech World  Analytics Insight
description: When it comes to customer satisfaction with smartphone apps or websites, most technology companies focus on the applications' ‘User Interface and User Experience Design’. Poor UI/UX design is one of the top reasons users stop engaging with a website or app.
